cards.rules_text:
Angel spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever an Angel you control enters, you gain 1 life.

Once during each of your turns, you may cast a permanent spell from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to devotion to white. A spell cast this way enters with a finality counter on it. [i](Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever Zephyr Legionnaire attacks, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token that's tapped and attacking. If your life total is at least 5 greater than your starting life total, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking instead.

Flash
Flying
When Radiant Savior enters, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may cast it by paying {2} rather than paying its mana cost.

[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Invoke the Angels. [i](Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.)[/i]
Exile up to one target nonland permanent until you control no Sagas or Angels.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains lifelink until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Sphinx spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a Sphinx you control enters, scry 1.

Flash
When Current Distortionist enters, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to your devotion to blue from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. [i](Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)[/i]

Flying
The first time you scry each turn, you may look at an additional two cards.
Create two 2/2 blue Sphinx creature tokens with flying and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.”

Invoke the Sphinxes. [i](Begin or advance the path of the Sphinx.)[/i]
Until your next turn, you can cast spells as though they had flash.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, look at that many cards from the top of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.rules_text:
Demon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a Demon you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life.

When Quag Prowler enters, choose one or two target creatures and/or planeswalkers an opponent controls with total mana value X or less and destroy them, where X is your devotion to black. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)[/i]

When Imperious Egoist enters, create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Deathtouch
Whenever Shaithana attacks a player with no cards in their hand, that player's life total becomes 1.

Invoke the Demons. [i](Begin or advance the Path of the Demon.)[/i]
Each player sacrifices a nonland permanent, discard a card, and loses 3 life.
Put target creature card with mana value 3 or less in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.rules_text:

Whenever a Dragon you control enters, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create an X/1 red Elemental creature token with haste, where X is your devotion to red. Exile that token at end of combat. [i](Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)[/i]

Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on Shrieking Magmaw.

Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, draw a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may pay up to 3 life. The next spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life paid this way.
